revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== From {{uder|en|nah|xochinacaztli|xōchinacaztli|ear-flower}}, from {{m|nah|xochitl|xōchitl|flower}}. So called because it somewhat resembles an ear. ===Noun=== {{en-noun|-}} # The [[earflower]], ''Cymbopetalum penduliflorum'', sometimes used by the Aztecs to flavour cocoa. ===See also=== * {{l|en|Mexican hand tree}}
